update iel_transport
declare_num = #{declareNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update iel_transport set declare_num = #{declareNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, destination = #{destination,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, arrival_list = #{arrivalList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_list = #{purchaseList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sales_contract = #{salesContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invoice = #{invoice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_contract = #{purchaseContract,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, export_cost = #{exportCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sales_list = #{salesList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entrance_cost = #{entranceCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = now() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(1) from iel_transport where declare_num = #{declareNum}
select count(1) from iel_transport where declare_num = #{declareNum} and id != #{id}

select
from iel_transport
and status = #{status}
order by create_time desc
